D E S C R I P T I O N:
At it's core- My Virtual Girlfriend - Single and Free is A funny, and flirty dating game where the objective is to choose your date, then romance your way into her heart until she falls in love with you.

There is literally thousands of beautiful girls to choose from, thanks to our girls generator - all with unique personalities and appearances.

What can i do with her? - Lots!
Engage in a conversation. Take actions, Go on activities like mini golf or a dinner date, Offer her gifts like a new bikini and she will even wear it for you. She even responds to your touch.

Every choice you make has it's rewards or consequences as you try to earn points with her. Its best to find things that cater to her unique personality. As you progress with her, she will grow to like you more and more. With each new level achieved, it will open up new ways of interacting with her and there are up to 35+ levels in the game.

Do the right things and she’s putty in your hands, but make the wrong moves and she will show you the door.


Features:

► 1000's of beautiful and unique girls to date
► Several ways to interact- through conversation, actions, activities and touch
► Girls may also be customized to your liking through the Custom girlfriend editor. Change her face, hair, skin, clothes, features, Bobble heads, body proportions, even her name.
► 35+ levels of progressive game play
► Vampire and Zombie girlfriends
► Personalities that can mimic female behaviors
► Clever artificial intelligence.
► Hi res 3D graphics with Camera control.
► Achievements and rewards
► Special outfits - bikinis, swimwear, lingerie, cheerleader, naughty cop and more!

It's all about flirting, love, dating and romance. Love is in the air and with this many cute females in one place, It's like being in Cancun for spring break!

Well, what are you waiting for? She's probably the cheapest date you will ever have so take one home today!
